title: BRIEF-Pet Plastics Ltd Accepts Resignation Of Aruna Ravilal Tripathi As CFO
text:
BRIEF-Pet Plastics Ltd Accepts Resignation Of Aruna Ravilal Tripathi As CFO

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 12:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pet Plastics Ltd Accepts Resignation Of Aruna Ravilal Tripathi As CFO Oct 9 (Reuters) - Pet Plastics Ltd PETP.BO : * PET PLASTICS LTD - ACCEPTS RESIGNATION OF ARUNA RAVILAL TRIPATHI, AS CFO OF COMPANY WITH EFFECT FROM CLOSURE OF BUSINESS HOURS OF OCTOBER 1, 2019. * PET PLASTICS LTD SAYS APPOINTS PRAJESH PRAVINBHAI CHAUDHARY, AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER OF COMPANY WITH EFFECT FROM OCTOBER 1, 2019

BRIEF-Pet Plastics Ltd Accepts Resignation Of Aruna Ravilal Tripathi As CFO
description: BRIEF-Pet Plastics Ltd Accepts Resignation Of Aruna Ravilal Tripathi As CFO
